PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-14602014-12-12,  LAB,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS in order to ensure consistency between the Canada Labour Code and the Regulations with respect to the new holiday pay formula, the two new leaves of absence, and to address a number of issues identified by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0305 Publication Date: 2014-12-31
AttachmentsAttachment
